body.raw:
{
    "recipeName": "Македонска Мусака (Macedonian Moussaka)",
    "description": "Macedonian Moussaka is a traditional dish made from layers of potato, minced meat, and tomato sauce, topped with a creamy yogurt and egg mixture.",
    "cookingDuration": "1.5 hours",
    "ingredients": ["potatoes", "minced meat", "tomato sauce", "onions", "garlic", "yogurt", "eggs", "flour", "butter", "milk", "salt", "pepper", "nutmeg"],
    "servings": 8,
    "difficulty": "MEDIUM",
    "cuisine": "Macedonian"
}
